417750.name: Left Alone
417750.description:
Left Alone plunges you into a first-person psychological horror journey, where darkness and memories intertwine. As secrets emerge from shadows, use your wits to solve puzzles and explore haunting, forgotten locations. Every step echoes with the past; can you face the truths that await?

Story

Step into the shoes of Joel Dent, an ex-military officer, recent divorcee, and individual recovering from physical trauma. Joel and his best friends had planned a fun and adventurous weekend of camping in the forests of Wisconsin. However, strange events lead him to an abandoned school with a horrific past. As Joel searches for his friends, he uncovers horrors that surpass his worst nightmares, making him wonder if he should have stayed "Left Alone."

Key Features

  • Psychological Horror: Unearth clues, notes, and memories from past students and visitors of the “Mount High School”.
  • Spooky Environments: Dive into multiple settings, from hiking trails to the confines of Mount High School, its surrounding areas and maybe even some secrets along the way.
  • Eerie Atmosphere: Experience a suspenseful ambience with audio meticulously designed for each locale, building tension.
  • Engaging Gameplay: Encounter shocking and immersive moments throughout, designed to cultivate a sense of mystery and discovery.
  • Puzzles & Clues: Solve puzzles and hunt for clues to find traces of your friends' whereabouts. Tread carefully; you might uncover more than you bargained for.

Development

Developed with passion, Left Alone is the result of two dedicated developers who invested two rigorous years into its creation. We hope you enjoy the experience as much as we enjoyed crafting it.
